name: Mach 3
description: Kill all the enemies, avoid the mines, and travel between distinct worlds to kill the evil mastermind in this behind-the-hero view shooter.
alsoFor: Amiga, Amstrad CPC, Atari ST, DOS, Thomson MO, Thomson TO, ZX Spectrum | Combined View
